\subsection*{Anexo 2 - Indicadores CAMEL calculados}

```{r}
datCamelIndNorm <- getDatCamelIndNorm(gestionInc = 2021)
```


### Capital {-}

```{r}
cols <- 
    grepl('indCap', names(datCamelIndNorm)) + 
    grepl('FECHA', names(datCamelIndNorm)) + 
    grepl('TIPO_DE_ENTIDAD', names(datCamelIndNorm))

dat <- datCamelIndNorm[,as.logical(cols)]

tail(dat, n = 20) %>% 
    kable(caption = "Indicadores de capital CAMEL", digits = 6) %>%
          kable_styling(latex_options = c("scale_down",'hold_position'))
```
